title: Leonidas Maleckis
text: Leonidas Maleckis (born 8 March 1966) is a Lithuanian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201992%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20middleweight">men's light middleweight</a> event at the <a href="1992%20Summer%20Olympics">1992 Summer Olympics</a>.
